content:
So they decided to observe ants instead.
What an interesting pair of people... Hm?
Who's the other person, you ask? Well... (smiling)

Back in the Academia, Mors and the others would sometimes lie down flat on the grass.\nAt first, I thought maybe they'd dropped their lunch or something,\nbut it turned out the ants were eating the lunch they'd left on their chairs!

The first important building,

And it turns out to be something as amazing as the Omni-Gallery!

As a scholar, can you imagine how thrilled I am?

I just saw Mors carefully tending to
the creatures you donated.
He even set his lunch to one side and forgot to eat it.
